titleStmt.title: A New bull-bayting, or, A Match play'd at the town-bull of Ely by twelve mungrills viz. 4 English, 4 Irish, 4 Scotch doggs, John Lilburn, Richard Overton, Thomas Prince, and William Walwyn, to stave and nose : with his last will and testament ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Sign of the [Bull] ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
